definition[0]: on the highest surface of something
example[0]: There should be an envelope on top of the fridge.
definition[1]: in complete control of a situation
example[1]: Don’t worry; I’m back on top of things now.
example[2]: I should be more on top of my work next week.
definition[2]: if something bad happens to you on top of something else, it happens when you have other problems
example[3]: On top of everything else, I now have to go to work next Saturday!
